message.raw: I was running each command in the tutorial in the same terminal, killing the previous before starting the next. A user who understands what is happening a bit better would not do this. :) I  edited the tutorial to try to clarify that each successive command expects the process created by the previous command to still be running.
message.html: I was running each command in the tutorial in the same terminal, killing the previous before starting the next. A user who understands what is happening a bit better would not do this. :) I edited the tutorial to try to clarify that each successive command expects the process created by the previous command to still be running.
